quote_last: “The firearms squad is in place, sir,” said a lone voice over the intercom, sounding like a crack of thunder, after a couple of hours of silence.
title: Nothing Ventured
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_last:
, Commander. I happened to glance at the clock.”
He held open the door wide. It seemed less an invitation to leave than a command.
title: The Murder Room
author: P.D. James

quote_first: Clock overturned when he fell forward. That’ll give us the time of the crime.
title: The Murder at the Vicarage
author: Agatha Christie
